# formUnion(_:)

**Instance Method**

Expands the bounding box to contain the specified bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func formUnion(_ other: BoundingBox)
```

## Parameters

- **other**: Another bounding box.
title: formUnion(_:)
